name: Titaniklad the Ash Dragon
text:
"Fallen of Albaz" + 1 monster with 2500 or more ATK
Gains ATK equal to the combined original Levels of the materials used for its Fusion Summon x 100. After this card is Fusion Summoned, for the rest of this turn, it is unaffected by the activated effects of other monsters that were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY because it was sent there this turn: You can take 1 "Dogmatika" monster or 1 "Fallen of Albaz" from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Titaniklad the Ash Dragon" once per turn.
